name: Prompt Quality Audit
description: Analyzes all campaign JSON definitions for process step clarity, tool coverage, guardrail completeness, and metric quality. Scores each campaign 1-5 and suggests improvements.
process: Fetch all campaign JSON files from test/campaigns/ via github_fetch

For each campaign definition, evaluate: (1) process step clarity and specificity, (2) tool coverage vs tools listed, (3) guardrail completeness (maxDuration, readOnly, killSwitch, budget), (4) metric KPI relevance, (5) target coverage
Score each campaign 1-5 on: clarity (are steps actionable?), coverage (do tools match process?), safety (are guardrails comprehensive?), observability (do KPIs capture success?)
Generate improvement suggestions for campaigns scoring below 4
Compile a summary report with average quality score and top improvement opportunities
Return JSON with KPIs: campaigns_analyzed, avg_quality_score, improvements_suggested, campaigns_below_threshold
